title: Log in to you no password
content: Hello Mozilla Community, Why do I only have to enter a password the first time I log in? Regardless of which browser (Firefox & EDGE) I use to log in the second time, after asking for my email address, I'm no longer asked for my password. I'm simply logged in. When I logged in for the first time and was asked if I wanted to save my password, I clicked no (and in Firefox, under Password, it's not). What do I/do I have to do so that I'm asked for my password every time? It's like this on Windows 10 and on my other computer with Windows 11 (both 64-bit and both up to date). And I use a translation program from German to English (I won't "say" that again in the future). Again, thank you in advance for your reply.
creator: bobtai

title: An Ads-on called "FDM" is not working on re-installing Firefox
content: After my laptop BSOD, I had to re-install windows 11 while backing up all the previous settings and apps. I used "Free Download Manager(FDM)" as my default downloader of movies from websites that generated Magnet links. On clicking the magnet link the FDM is not opening by default, no action is seen. I've tried many options including the Support Centre of FDM from where I was advised to visit my browser support. I have used Firefox for 14 years, let me know where I'm wrong.

title: Primary account email required for sign-in
content: I wanted to create two profiles to separate my work and personal contacts. For security reasons, I also wanted to set up one account as the secondary email address for the other (I only have these two email addresses). Account A is a Gmail account and Account B is an enterprise domain account. Account B had the Gmail account as the 'secondary email'. However, when I try to access the Account A profile, I receive a red square message saying 'Primary account email required for sign-in' after entering the password. Perhaps I did something wrong, but... How can I access my Account A profile? Account B no longer has a secondary email address to prevent further problems.

title: Login Aplikasi Pangkalan Data Murid
content: Proses log masuk menjadi lebih efisien dan selamat, manakala setiap guru diwajibkan untuk mengemas kini kata laluan mereka secara berkala. Melalui APDM, ibu bapa juga boleh menyemak kehadiran anak-anak dengan lebih mudah, apdm login manakala data yang dikumpulkan menyumbang kepada pelbagai urusan rasmi seperti bantuan kewangan atau analisis prestasi akademik. Sistem ini turut berintegrasi dengan modul pendidikan lain di bawah KPM, menjadikannya pusat maklumat utama untuk pengurusan murid di seluruh negara.

title: Trying to sign into Epson support site being blocked by Malwarebyes as malware!
content: I just got a new Epson 3-in-one printer and tried to sign up for the warranty. I got a message that the warranty was expired... I had an Epson printer more than ten years ago; I don't remember the password and they don't provide an option to reset it. HELP, PLEASE.
